remarks: Create a direct product by finding subgroups inside each factor of another direct product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dprdss.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd T ) $.
dprdss.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom T = I ) $.
dprdss.3 $e |- ( ph -> S : I --> ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
dprdss.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. I ) -> ( S ` k ) C_ ( T ` k ) ) $.
dprdss $p |- ( ph -> ( G dom DProd S /\ ( G DProd S ) C_ ( G DProd T ) ) ) $.
$d G k $.
$d I k $.
$d S k $.
$d T k $.
$d k ph $.
